item.title: MySQL 8.0 实战指南：从入门到性能优化
item.description:
前言

MySQL 是世界上最流行的开源关系型数据库，被广泛应用于各种规模的应用系统中。MySQL 8.0 带来了许多新特性，包括窗口函数、CTE、JSON 增强等，让数据库操作更加高效和灵活。

-- 创建表
CREATE TABLE users (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    age TINYINT UNSIGNED DEFAULT 0,
    status TINYINT DEFAULT 1 COMMENT '状态：1-正常 0-禁用',
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    deleted_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
    INDEX idx_email (email),
    INDEX idx_status_created (status, created_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='用户表';

-- 查看表结构
DESC users;
SHOW CREATE TABLE users;

-- 修改表

ALTER TABLE users MODIFY COLUMN username VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE users DROP COLUMN phone;
ALTER TABLE users ADD INDEX idx_phone (phone);
ALTER TABLE users DROP INDEX idx_phone;

-- 重命名表
RENAME TABLE users TO members;

-- 删除表
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users;

-- 创建订单表
CREATE TABLE orders (
    id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    status TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    INDEX idx_user_id (user_id)
);

-- INNER JOIN
SELECT u.username, o.amount 
FROM users u
INNER JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id;

-- LEFT JOIN
SELECT u.username, o.amount 
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id;

-- RIGHT JOIN
SELECT u.username, o.amount 
FROM users u
RIGHT JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id;

-- 多表联查
SELECT u.username, o.amount, p.name as product
FROM users u
JOIN orders o ON u.id = o.user_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.id;

-- 自连接
SELECT e1.name as employee, e2.name as manager
FROM employees e1
LEFT JOIN employees e2 ON e1.manager_id = e2.id;

-- ROW_NUMBER：行号
SELECT username, age, 
       ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY age DESC) as row_num
FROM users;

-- RANK：排名（有并列）
SELECT username, age,
       RANK() OVER (ORDER BY age DESC) as rank_num
FROM users;

-- DENSE_RANK：密集排名
SELECT username, age,
       DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY age DESC) as dense_rank_num
FROM users;

-- 分组排名
SELECT username, status, age,
       ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY status ORDER BY age DESC) as rank_in_status
FROM users;

-- LAG / LEAD：前后行值
SELECT username, age,
       LAG(age, 1) OVER (ORDER BY id) as prev_age,
       LEAD(age, 1) OVER (ORDER BY id) as next_age
FROM users;

-- 累计求和
SELECT username, amount,
       SUM(amount) OVER (ORDER BY created_at) as running_total
FROM orders;

-- 基本 CTE
WITH active_users AS (
    SELECT * FROM users WHERE status = 1
)
SELECT * FROM active_users WHERE age > 20;

-- 多个 CTE
WITH 
user_orders AS (
    SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as order_count, SUM(amount) as total_amount
    FROM orders GROUP BY user_id
),
vip_users AS (
    SELECT user_id FROM user_orders WHERE total_amount > 10000
)
SELECT u.*, uo.order_count, uo.total_amount
FROM users u
JOIN user_orders uo ON u.id = uo.user_id
WHERE u.id IN (SELECT user_id FROM vip_users);

-- 递归 CTE
WITH RECURSIVE category_tree AS (
    SELECT id, name, parent_id, 1 as level
    FROM categories WHERE parent_id IS NULL
    UNION ALL
    SELECT c.id, c.name, c.parent_id, ct.level + 1
    FROM categories c
    JOIN category_tree ct ON c.parent_id = ct.id
)
SELECT * FROM category_tree;

-- 创建带 JSON 字段的表
CREATE TABLE products (
    id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    attributes JSON
);

-- 插入 JSON 数据
INSERT INTO products VALUES (1, 'iPhone', '{"color": "black", "storage": 256, "features": ["5G", "Face ID"]}');

-- 查询 JSON 字段
SELECT name, attributes->>'$.color' as color FROM products;
SELECT name, JSON_EXTRACT(attributes, '$.storage') as storage FROM products;

-- JSON 条件查询
SELECT * FROM products WHERE attributes->>'$.color' = 'black';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(attributes, '"5G"', '$.features');

-- 更新 JSON
UPDATE products SET attributes = JSON_SET(attributes, '$.price', 999) WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE products SET attributes = JSON_REMOVE(attributes, '$.features') WHERE id = 1;

# my.cnf 关键配置

# InnoDB 缓冲池（建议为物理内存的 70-80%）
innodb_buffer_pool_size = 4G

# 日志文件大小
innodb_log_file_size = 256M

# 连接数
max_connections = 500

# 查询缓存（MySQL 8.0 已移除）
# query_cache_type = 1

# 临时表

# 排序缓冲

    MASTER_HOST='master_host',

    MASTER_LOG_FILE='mysql-bin.000001',

总结

MySQL 是一个功能强大且成熟的关系型数据库，掌握其核心知识对于后端开发至关重要。

核心要点：

  • 📝 熟练掌握 SQL 语法
  • 🔍 理解索引原理和优化
  • 🔒 掌握事务和锁机制
  • ⚡ 学会查询性能优化
  • 🏗️ 了解高可用架构设计
